channel.title: Kobe Bryant on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Kobe Bryant on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Kobe Bryant Film in the Works at Warner Bros.
item.description: Alex Sohn and Gavin Johannsen wrote ‘With the 8th Pick,’ focusing on the process that saw the future basketball superstar getting drafted into the NBA in 1996.

item.title: Kobe Bryant Film in the Works at Warner Bros.

item.title: Kobe Bryant Movie in the Works at Warner Bros.: Studio Nabs Spec Script About Lakers Star’s Dramatic Draft Day
item.description: Warner Bros. Pictures has acquired a spec script based on the dramatic true story of NBA legend Kobe Bryant joining the Los Angeles Lakers, Variety has confirmed. The project comes from screenwriters
